channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Panelbase for The Sunday Times, 30 March–1 April 2021 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 61–69 seats
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 21–30 seats
  • Scottish Labour: 17–24 seats
  • Scottish Greens: 4–11 seats
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 2–6 seats
  • Alba Party: 0–8 seats
  • All For Unity: 0–3 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Panelbase for The Sunday Times, 30 March–1 April 2021 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Panelbase for The Sunday Times, 30 March–1 April 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 36.0–42.1%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 18.6–23.6%
  • Scottish Labour: 14.8–19.5%
  • Scottish Greens: 6.5–9.9%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 3.8–6.5%
  • Alba Party: 4.7–7.7%
  • All For Unity: 2.9–5.3%
